verses.verse: לֵאמֹ֡ר <S%H559><s%> They say הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> If יְשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> put away אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If a man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּוֹ֩ <S%H802><s%> his wife וְהָלְכָ֨ה <S%H1980><s%> and she go מֵאִתּ֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְהָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> and belongs לְאִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man's אַחֵ֗ר <S%H312><s%> from him and become another הֲיָשׁ֤וּב <S%H7725><s%> shall he return unto her again אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> about ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still הֲל֛וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not חָנ֥וֹף <S%H2610><s%> be greatly תֶּחֱנַ֖ף <S%H2610><s%> polluted הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ? shall not that land הַהִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאַ֗תְּ <S%H859><s%> you זָנִית֙ <S%H2181><s%> ? but thou hast played the harlot רֵעִ֣ים <S%H7453><s%> lovers רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> with many וְשׁ֥וֹב <S%H7725><s%> yet return again אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> to me saith יְהֹוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

שְׂאִֽי־ <S%H5375><s%> Lift up עֵינַ֨יִךְ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto שְׁפָיִ֜ם <S%H8205><s%> unto the high places וּרְאִ֗י <S%H7200><s%> and see אֵיפֹה֙ <S%H375><s%> where לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not [שֻׁגַּלְתְּ כ] (שֻׁכַּ֔בְּתְּ <S%H7693><s%> lie with ק) עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with דְּרָכִים֙ <S%H1870><s%> with In the ways יָשַׁ֣בְתְּ <S%H3427><s%> hast thou sat לָהֶ֔ם כַּעֲרָבִ֖י <S%H6163><s%> for them as the Arabian בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness וַתַּחֲנִ֣יפִי <S%H2610><s%> and thou hast polluted אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land בִּזְנוּתַ֖יִךְ <S%H2184><s%> with thy whoredoms וּבְרָעָתֵֽךְ׃ <S%H7451><s%> and with thy wickedness

וַיִּמָּנְע֣וּ <S%H4513><s%> have been withholden רְבִבִ֔ים <S%H7241><s%> Therefore the showers וּמַלְק֖וֹשׁ <S%H4456><s%> and there hath been no latter rain ל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> no הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> has been וּמֵ֨צַח <S%H4696><s%> forehead אִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> ess זוֹנָה֙ <S%H2181><s%> commit fornication הָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> had לָ֔ךְ מֵאַ֖נְתְּ <S%H3985><s%> thou refusedst הִכָּלֵֽם׃ <S%H3637><s%> to be ashamed

הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not מֵעַ֔תָּה <S%H6258><s%> now [קָרָאתִי כ] (קָרָ֥את <S%H7121><s%> bewray ק) לִ֖י אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> unto me My father אַלּ֥וּף <S%H441><s%> thou [art] the guide נְעֻרַ֖י <S%H5271><s%> childhood אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

הֲיִנְטֹ֣ר <S%H5201><s%> Will he reserve לְעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> alway אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יִשְׁמֹ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> beward לָנֶ֑צַח <S%H5331><s%> alway הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold [דִבַּרְתִּי כ] (דִבַּ֛רְתְּ <S%H1696><s%> answer ק) וַתַּעֲשִׂ֥י <S%H6213><s%> and done הָרָע֖וֹת <S%H7451><s%> evil things וַתּוּכָֽל׃ <S%H3201><s%> as thou couldest פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me בִּימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> also unto me in the days יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הֲ‍ֽרָאִ֔יתָ <S%H7200><s%> Hast thou seen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what עָשְׂתָ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> hath done מְשֻׁבָ֣ה <S%H4878><s%> [that] which backsliding יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel הֹלְכָ֨ה <S%H1980><s%> ? she is gone up הִ֜יא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> mountain גָּבֹ֗הַּ <S%H1364><s%> upon every high וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and תַּ֛חַת <S%H8478><s%> and under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree רַעֲנָ֖ן <S%H7488><s%> every green וַתִּזְנִי־ <S%H2181><s%> and there hath played the harlot שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> And I said אַחֲרֵ֨י <S%H310><s%> after עֲשׂוֹתָ֧הּ <S%H6213><s%> she had done אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> about תָּשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> all these [things] Turn וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁ֑בָה <S%H7725><s%> thou unto me But she returned [וַתֵּרֶאה כ] (וַתֵּ֛רֶא <S%H7200><s%> advise self ק) בָּגוֹדָ֥ה <S%H901><s%> not And her treacherous אֲחוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H269><s%> sister יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> Judah

וָאֵ֗רֶא <S%H7200><s%> And I saw כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all אֹדוֹת֙ <S%H182><s%> when for all the causes אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after נִֽאֲפָה֙ <S%H5003><s%> committed adultery מְשֻׁבָ֣ה <S%H4878><s%> whereby backsliding יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel שִׁלַּחְתִּ֕יהָ <S%H7971><s%> I had put her away וָאֶתֵּ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> and given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סֵ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> her a bill כְּרִיתֻתֶ֖יהָ <S%H3748><s%> of divorce אֵלֶ֑יהָ <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָֽרְאָ֜ה <S%H3372><s%> feared בֹּֽגֵדָ֤ה <S%H898><s%> yet her treacherous יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> Judah אֲחוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H269><s%> sister וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַתִּ֥זֶן <S%H2181><s%> and played the harlot גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become מִקֹּ֣ל <S%H6963><s%> And it came to pass through the lightness זְנוּתָ֔הּ <S%H2184><s%> of her whoredom וַתֶּחֱנַ֖ף <S%H2610><s%> that she defiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וַתִּנְאַ֥ף <S%H5003><s%> and committed adultery אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הָאֶ֖בֶן <S%H68><s%> with stones וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for הָעֵֽץ׃ <S%H6086><s%> and with stocks וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner

זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁ֨בָה <S%H7725><s%> hath not turned אֵלַ֜י <S%H413><s%> about בָּגוֹדָ֧ה <S%H901><s%> And yet for all this her treacherous אֲחוֹתָ֛הּ <S%H269><s%> sister יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all לִבָּ֑הּ <S%H3820><s%> unto me with her whole heart כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo בְּשֶׁ֖קֶר <S%H8267><s%> but feignedly נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about צִדְּקָ֥ה <S%H6663><s%> hath justified נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <S%H5315><s%> herself מְשֻׁבָ֣ה <S%H4878><s%> unto me The backsliding יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מִבֹּגֵדָ֖ה <S%H898><s%> more than treacherous יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> Judah

הָלֹ֡ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְקָֽרָאתָ֩ <S%H7121><s%> and proclaim אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֨ים <S%H1697><s%> these words הָאֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these צָפ֗וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> toward the north וְ֠אָמַרְתָּ <S%H559><s%> and say שׁ֣וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> Return מְשֻׁבָ֤ה <S%H4878><s%> thou backsliding יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אַפִּ֥יל <S%H5307><s%> to fall פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> [and] I will not cause mine anger בָּכֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חָסִ֤יד <S%H2623><s%> upon you for I [am] merciful אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶטּ֖וֹר <S%H5201><s%> [and] I will not keep לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> [anger] for ever

אַ֚ךְ <S%H389><s%> Only דְּעִ֣י <S%H3045><s%> Only acknowledge עֲוֹנֵ֔ךְ <S%H5771><s%> thine iniquity כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> against בַּיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD אֱלֹהַ֖יִךְ <S%H430><s%> thy God פָּשָׁ֑עַתְּ <S%H6586><s%> that thou hast transgressed וַתְּפַזְּרִ֨י <S%H6340><s%> and hast scattered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּרָכַ֜יִךְ <S%H1870><s%> thy ways לַזָּרִ֗ים <S%H2114><s%> to the strangers תַּ֚חַת <S%H8478><s%> under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree רַעֲנָ֔ן <S%H7488><s%> under every green וּבְקוֹלִ֥י <S%H6963><s%> my voice לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8085><s%> and ye have not obeyed נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהֹוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

שׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Turn בָנִ֤ים <S%H1121><s%> children שׁוֹבָבִים֙ <S%H7726><s%> O backsliding נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I בָּעַ֣לְתִּי <S%H1166><s%> for I am married בָכֶ֑ם וְלָקַחְתִּ֨י <S%H3947><s%> unto you and I will take אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> you one מֵעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> of a city וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> and two מִמִּשְׁפָּחָ֔ה <S%H4940><s%> of a family וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <S%H935><s%> and I will bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> you to Zion

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> And I will give לָכֶ֛ם רֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> you pastors כְּלִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> according to mine heart וְרָע֥וּ <S%H7462><s%> which shall feed אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> דֵּעָ֥ה <S%H1844><s%> you with knowledge וְהַשְׂכֵּֽיל׃ <S%H7919><s%> and understanding

וְהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when תִרְבּוּ֩ <S%H7235><s%> And it shall come to pass when ye be multiplied וּפְרִיתֶ֨ם <S%H6509><s%> and increased בָּאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land בַּיָּמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> in those days הָהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> those נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יֹ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> they shall say ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer אֲרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> no more The ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> neither shall it come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> to mind וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִזְכְּרוּ־ <S%H2142><s%> neither shall they remember בוֹ֙ וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִפְקֹ֔דוּ <S%H6485><s%> it neither shall they visit וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will no יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> [it] neither shall [that] be done עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> again

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> they יִקְרְא֤וּ <S%H7121><s%> they shall call לִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> the throne יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְנִקְוּ֨וּ <S%H6960><s%> shall be gathered אֵלֶ֧יהָ <S%H413><s%> about כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <S%H1471><s%> and all the nations לְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> unto it to the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יֵלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> walk ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> anymore אַחֲרֵ֕י <S%H310><s%> any more after שְׁרִר֖וּת <S%H8307><s%> the imagination לִבָּ֥ם <S%H3820><s%> heart הָרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> of their evil ס

בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> In those days הָהֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> those יֵלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> will walk בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> with the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְיָבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they shall come יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> together מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land צָפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i הִנְחַ֖לְתִּי <S%H5157><s%> that I have given for an inheritance אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> unto your fathers

וְאָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I אָמַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> But I said אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> How אֲשִׁיתֵ֣ךְ <S%H7896><s%> How shall I put בַּבָּנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> thee among the children וְאֶתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and give לָךְ֙ אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land חֶמְדָּ֔ה <S%H2532><s%> thee a pleasant נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> heritage צְבִ֖י <S%H6643><s%> a goodly צִבְא֣וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of the hosts גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> Gentile וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> said אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> me My father [תִּקְרְאוּ־ כ] (תִּקְרְאִי־ <S%H7121><s%> shall call לִ֔י <S%H7121><s%> Thou shalt call ק) וּמֵאַחֲרַ֖י <S%H310><s%> from me לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not [תָשׁוּבוּ כ] (תָשֽׁוּבִי׃ <S%H7725><s%> break ק)

אָכֵ֛ן <S%H403><s%> Surely בָּגְדָ֥ה <S%H898><s%> treacherously אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> [as] a wife מֵרֵעָ֑הּ <S%H7453><s%> departeth from her husband כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> So בְּגַדְתֶּ֥ם <S%H898><s%> so have ye dealt treacherously בִּ֛י בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> with me O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

ק֚וֹל <S%H6963><s%> A voice עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁפָיִ֣ים <S%H8205><s%> upon the high places נִשְׁמָ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> was heard בְּכִ֥י <S%H1065><s%> weeping תַחֲנוּנֵ֖י <S%H8469><s%> [and] supplications בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because הֶעֱוּוּ֙ <S%H5753><s%> for they have perverted אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכָּ֔ם <S%H1870><s%> their way שָׁכְח֖וּ <S%H7911><s%> [and] they have forgotten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהֹוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> their God

שׁ֚וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Return בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> children שׁוֹבָבִ֔ים <S%H7726><s%> ye backsliding אֶרְפָּ֖ה <S%H7495><s%> [and] I will heal מְשׁוּבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H4878><s%> your backslidings הִנְנוּ֙ <S%H2005><s%> behold אָתָ֣נוּ <S%H857><s%> Behold we come לָ֔ךְ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> You יְהֹוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto thee for thou [art] the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God

אָכֵ֥ן <S%H403><s%> Truly לַשֶּׁ֛קֶר <S%H8267><s%> in vain מִגְּבָע֖וֹת <S%H1389><s%> [is salvation hoped for] from the hills הָמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> [and from] the multitude הָרִ֑ים <S%H2022><s%> of mountains אָכֵן֙ <S%H403><s%> truly בַּיהֹוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God תְּשׁוּעַ֖ת <S%H8668><s%> [is] the salvation יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְהַבֹּ֗שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> For shame אָֽכְלָ֛ה <S%H398><s%> hath devoured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְגִ֥יעַ <S%H3018><s%> the labour אֲבוֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1><s%> of our fathers מִנְּעוּרֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5271><s%> from our youth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹאנָם֙ <S%H6629><s%> their flocks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּקָרָ֔ם <S%H1241><s%> and their herds אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> their sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1323><s%> and their daughters

נִשְׁכְּבָ֣ה <S%H7901><s%> We lie down בְּבָשְׁתֵּ֗נוּ <S%H1322><s%> in our shame וּֽתְכַסֵּנוּ֮ <S%H3680><s%> covereth כְּלִמָּתֵנוּ֒ <S%H3639><s%> and our confusion כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> against לַיהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֜ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God חָטָ֗אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> us for we have sinned אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H587><s%> we וַאֲבוֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> we and our fathers מִנְּעוּרֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5271><s%> from our youth וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> even unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁמַ֔עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> and have not obeyed בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהֹוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God ס
